recipe.title: Mignonette Sauce
ingredients: 1 tablespoon coarsely ground white or black peppercorns (vary amount according to taste)
1/2 cup white or red wine vinegar
2 tablespoons finely chopped shallots or sweet onions
instructions: Combine all ingredients and chill. Serve with chilled oysters or clams on the half shell.
